page.title: 08ECONOMICS IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: There are four banks in Dalbeattie, the Royal Bank of Scotland,the Clydesdale Bank,the Trustee Savings Bank and the Bank of Scotland. There is one finance company, the Dalbeattie Finance Company. It also has branches in Galashiels and Stranraer.There are branches of 3 Building Societies.All of these places will help people to work out their financial affairs. People can borrow money and repay it over a period of time, paying interest on the loan. They can also deposit money and be paid for letting these firms use their money. The Post Office Savings Bank offers the same service.
